docs.lead_paragraph: The vegetables in this dish are perfectly happy served with grains, or they can form the basis for a hearty Provençal-style gratin.

headline.seo: Winter Squash and Cabbage and a Winter Vegetable Gratin — Recipes for Health
headline.main: Sautéed Shredded Winter Squash and Cabbage and a Winter Vegetable Gratin

docs.snippet: The vegetables in this dish are perfectly happy served with grains, or they can form the basis for a hearty Provençal-style gratin.

docs.lead_paragraph: A drug that scientists had hoped would help prevent breast cancer has a significant side effect.

headline.seo: Exemestane, Thought to Prevent Cancer, Also Causes Bone Loss
headline.main: Cancer-Deterring Drug Found to Harm Bones
headline.print_headline: Cancer-Deterring Drug Found to Harm Bones

docs.abstract: Dr Angela M Cheung study published in journal The Lancet Oncology finds drug exemestane, which was welcomed for its potential to prevent invasive breast cancer in women with higher risk of the disease, poses risk of bone loss.
docs.snippet: A drug that scientists had hoped would help prevent breast cancer has a significant side effect.

docs.lead_paragraph: Continued obstacles plague the effort to provide a reliable supply of technetium 99m, a radioisotope crucial to identifying heart and kidney disease and assisting in breast cancer surgery.

headline.seo: G.E. Ends Bid to Create a Supply of Technetium 99m
headline.main: Radioisotope Recipe Lacks One Ingredient: Cash
headline.print_headline: Radioisotope Recipe Lacks One Ingredient: Cash

docs.abstract: Obstacles continue to plague the effort to provide a reliable supply of technetium 99m, a radioactive isotope crucial to identifying heart and kidney disease and assisting in breast cancer surgery; among the obstacles is the fact that the recipe for tech 99 requires another isotope, made in nuclear reactors using weapon-grade uranium, which is increasingly hard to obtain.
docs.snippet: Continued obstacles plague the effort to provide a reliable supply of technetium 99m, a radioisotope crucial to identifying heart and kidney disease and assisting in breast cancer surgery.

docs.lead_paragraph: Perhaps too much emphasis is placed on looking for existing breast cancer when the search should focus on prevention and the possibility of finding a vaccine.

headline.seo: Breast Cancer Screening Matters, but Prevention Is the Real Goal
headline.main: Real Race in Cancer Is Finding Its Cause
headline.print_headline: Real Race In Cancer Is Finding Its Cause

docs.abstract: Dr Susan Love essay examines the limitations of routine mammography screening as a method for combating breast cancer; contends that breast cancer advocacy must move beyond screening for cancers that are already there, even beyond the cure, to finding the cause.
docs.snippet: Perhaps too much emphasis is placed on looking for existing breast cancer when the search should focus on prevention and the possibility of finding a vaccine.

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The numbers are being quietly fought over in e-mails among malaria specialists at the World Health Organization and the University of Washington.

headline.seo: Did Malaria Kill 655,000 People in 2011 or Twice That?
headline.main: Malaria: Specialists Duel Over Death Toll in 2011: Was It 655,000 People or Twice as Many?
headline.print_headline: Malaria: Specialists Duel Over Death Toll in 2011: Was It 655,000 People or Twice as Many?

docs.abstract: Malaria specialists are at odds over the number of people killed by malaria in 2011; study published in journal The Lancet claims the official World Health Organization estimate of 655,000 is far too low and that actual number of deaths may be 1.2 million.
docs.snippet: The numbers are being quietly fought over in e-mails among malaria specialists at the World Health Organization and the University of Washington.

docs.lead_paragraph: Fructose consumption may increase cardiovascular risk factors because it increases visceral fat, the kind that accumulates around internal organs.

headline.seo: Fructose Consumption Increases Visceral Fat, Study Reports
headline.main: Risks: Fructose Intake Is Linked to Visceral Fat
headline.print_headline: Risks: Fructose Intake Is Linked to Visceral Fat

docs.abstract: Study by Norman K Pollock published in The Journal of Nutrition finds fructose consumption, largely from high-fructose corn syrup, may increase cardiovascular risk factors because it increases visceral fat, the type that accumulates around internal organs.
docs.snippet: Fructose consumption may increase cardiovascular risk factors because it increases visceral fat, the kind that accumulates around internal organs.

docs.lead_paragraph: After the installation of cameras and boards announcing compliance rates, hand washing at an I.C.U. soared, a study shows.

headline.seo: When Watched and Cheered On, I.C.U. Workers Wash Hands More
headline.main: Prevention: Cameras Can Help Ensure Hand Washing
headline.print_headline: Prevention: Cameras Can Help Ensure Hand Washing

docs.abstract: Dr Bruce F Farber study published in journal Clinical Infectious Diseases finds that installing cameras in washrooms is a simple and effective way of getting hospital workers to wash their hands consistently.
docs.snippet: After the installation of cameras and boards announcing compliance rates, hand washing at an I.C.U. soared, a study shows.

docs.lead_paragraph: On a low-protein diet, the body is forced to get its protein from lean body mass, a study shows.

headline.seo: Low-Protein Diets May Be Costly to Lean Body Mass
headline.main: Nutrition: Low-Protein Diet May Cost Lean Body Mass
headline.print_headline: Nutrition: Low-Protein Diet May Cost Lean Body Mass

docs.abstract: Dr George A Bray study published in The Journal of the American Medical Association finds that people consuming excess calories on a low-protein diet may gain less weight than others, but they will also lose lean body mass.
docs.snippet: On a low-protein diet, the body is forced to get its protein from lean body mass, a study shows.

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The season’s sturdy roots, squash and greens need little more than a few turns in a hot pan to become appealing partners for a variety of grains.

headline.seo: Cauliflower, Brussels Sprouts and Red Beans With Lemon and Mustard
headline.main: A Grain, a Vegetable, a Skillet: Meals for Winter Nights

docs.snippet: The season’s sturdy roots, squash and greens need little more than a few turns in a hot pan to become appealing partners for a variety of grains.
